TopicTitle: You may have seen Kerbal Space Propaganda, but now is The Jebotomic Bomb

Articles.Content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kZAOZ_krGiI


Also the reason there is no footage of jeb actually riding the bomb down, is because the seat was "Obstructed" and I had worked on so many designs for the bomber, I was done.
Really good video! I enjoyed the ending, but sad because we didn't get to see any footage of Jeb riding the bomb;.;
The best part is that it ends n a cheerful song and a call to join the military. Just like any good propaganda!

The best part is that it ends n a cheerful song and a call to join the military. Just like any good propaganda!

Thanks! I did think it cut to it a bit suddenly but it was late and I was tired of all the editing, because some of the video files got corrupted, or else the video would also have been about 2:20

Really good video! I enjoyed the ending, but sad because we didn't get to see any footage of Jeb riding the bomb;.;

Well, in case you didn't read it, the seat I put on the bomb was apparently "obstructed" so I couldn't do anything with it.
